name: Beat Knight XR
description:
Beat Knight XR, WebXR or VR Game for Party Time!
Attack Slime! Beat Knight XR   is a Action/Arcade VR Game    game  by Daydev Company Limited™.

You enjoy enhancing weapons , Two Magic Sword!

  • The end   game    of the killing time   game 
  • Simple   game   method. 
  • The end   game for raising   game ! ! !

Available on Website, Let's beat the Monster!
Beat Knight XR    is an online   WebXR Game   that you can play in modern browsers for free.

  http://beatknightxr.web.app/
